changeSet.author: daehyun@skymind.io
daehyun@skymind.io
changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE TRIGGER update_model AFTER UPDATE OF last_activity_date ON public.experiment FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE public.update_model_activity_date();

changeSet.author: daehyun@skymind.io
daehyun@skymind.io
changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE TRIGGER update_project AFTER UPDATE OF last_activity_date ON public.model FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE public.update_project_activity_date();

changeSet.author: steph@followsteph.com
changeSet.comment: Updating the sample coffee example to the new JSON progress structure.

changeSet.author: steph@followsteph.com
changeSet.comment: Convert some key policy json values to database values.

changeSet.author: steph@followsteph.com
steph@followsteph.com
changeSet.comment: Convert the EXECUTION_PROVIDER_META_DATA to be more efficient and easier to use and maintain
Convert the data to the new column formats - this is a bit complex but it can be done in SQL.

changeSet.author: steph@followsteph.com
onur@vaadin.com
changeSet.comment: If there are duplicated project names, update them before adding db constraint
changeSet.sql: UPDATE PROJECT SET NAME = NAME || '-' || ID where (PATHMIND_USER_ID, NAME) IN (SELECT PATHMIND_USER_ID, NAME FROM PROJECT GROUP BY PATHMIND_USER_ID, NAME HAVING COUNT(NAME) > 1);

changeSet.author: steph@followsteph.com
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO guide (project_id, step) (SELECT project.id, 0 FROM project LEFT JOIN guide ON project.id=guide.project_id WHERE guide.project_id IS NULL);

column.name: KEYWORD
column.value: Worker crashed during call to train()

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Unrecognized error. Please contact Pathmind team.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Training failed to initialize. Please contact the Pathmind team.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Invalid reward function syntax. Create a new experiment to update your reward function.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Runtime error. Please contact the Pathmind team.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Runtime error. Please contact the Pathmind team.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Incorrect number of actions or observations detected. Please double check the size of your actions or observations array and re-upload your model.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Unsupported version of AnyLogic detected. Please contact support@pathmind.com.

column.name: KEYWORD
column.value: unzip: cannot find or open model.jar, model.jar.zip or model.jar.ZIP

changeSet.author: alexander.makarov@toptal.com
changeSet.sql: UPDATE POLICY SET HAS_FILE = TRUE WHERE EXISTS( SELECT POLICY_ID FROM POLICY_FILE WHERE POLICY_ID = ID AND FILE IS NOT NULL );

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Run terminated. Server is out of memory. Please contact Pathmind support.

column.name: KEYWORD
column.value: FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'database/db.properties'

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Missing database. Please re-upload your model and try again.

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MODEL_FILE, MODEL WHERE ID=MODEL_ID AND MODEL_FILE_MOVED_TO_S3=FALSE AND FILE IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POLICY_FILE, POLICY WHERE ID=POLICY_ID AND POLICY_FILE_MOVED_TO_S3=FALSE AND FILE IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POLICY_SNAPSHOT, POLICY WHERE ID=POLICY_ID AND POLICY_SNAPSHOT_MOVED_TO_S3=FALSE AND SNAPSHOT IS NOT NULL;

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: An error occurred. Please contact the Pathmind team

rollback.comment: It's not possible to rollback dropping a table.
It's not possible to rollback dropping a table.

changeSet.author: onur@vaadin.com
changeSet.comment: Created two columns for the data stored in EXECUTION_PROVIDER_META_DATA table. The stored procedure will go through the records, and updates these new columns. Once, the new columns are updated with the values in EXECUTION_PROVIDER_META_DATA table, both the function and the table is dropped.

rollback.comment: If something goes wrong, just drop the new columns and migration procedure, keep in mind that EXECUTION_PROVIDER_META_DATA table is dropped once everything is completed
